title: AE脚本：关键帧动画图层生成标记 Aescripts trigger v1.0 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 该AE脚本Aescripts trigger v1.0可根据关键帧或图层起始做记号标记，智能人性化，预合成后也会在合成上生成标记。压缩包内含脚本和使用视频教程。官网地址为http://aescripts.com/trigger/。适用于Win/Mac系统下的AE CS4/CS5/CS6/CC/CC2014/CC2015 。脚本安装需拷贝.jsxbin脚本文件到AE安装目录下：Support Files\Scripts\ScriptUI Pane。

download_links.name: AE脚本：关键帧动画图层生成标记 Aescripts trigger v1.0 + 使用教程

other.英文介绍: animations by triggering animations inside a precomp using layer markers. Easily create Trigger comps, add markers, and trigger animations from inside a precomp . Turn your linear workflow into an automated event based workflow, allowing you to non-destructively retime complex animations, easily test out multiple versions of an animation, and sequence together multiple animation events easily from your global composition.
